feed.title: BORIS - Behavioral Observation Research Interactive Software
feed.subtitle: BORIS news!

entry.title: News on the BORIS future major version (v. 7)
entry.content: v. 7 will have 8 media file players. Every player could be undocked from the main window and reorganized on the your desktop
entry.summary:
v. 7 will have 8 media file players.
Every player could be undocked from the main window and reorganized on the your desktop

entry.title: v. 6.3.1 available
entry.content: A bug in the 'nest media' function was fixed
